title: I am 16 years old and want to become rich so badly. I read financial books and know exactly why I want to be rich. Can someone give me some good advice and help? - Quora

response.answer_text: No doubt there are some of the universes most powerful secrets staring you in the face right now. (Most people dont even know they're there!) I didnt fully believe it untill I talked with my boss Dan a bit more, and true. I wonder which financial books you read. “the creature from Jekyll island"?(you should read that, if you can handle going crazy for about a week [I did]) did you know the interest system that banks charge for homes (I think it applies to all loan-interest systems, but I think bulk quantities of home loans pay them very well) exploit lendee ignorance? This has been the most important book of my life. It has guided me for 45 years. Written in 1910. Think and Grow Rich came out in 1937. It is the other book that changed my life. It showed me how to apply the knowledge from As a Man Thinketh. Read, The Millionaire Next Door by Thomas J. Stanley Commitment- “Until one is committed, there is hesitancy, the chance to draw back, always ineffectiveness. Concerning all acts of initiative (and creation), there is one elementary truth, the ignorance of which kills countless ideas and splendid plans: That the moment one definitely commits oneself, then Providence (the protective care of God) moves too. All sorts of things occur to help one that would never otherwise have occurred.
